name: liri-node-app
description: 1. Clearly state the problem the app is trying to solve (i.e. what is it doing and why) 2. Give a high-level overview of how the app is organized 3. Give start-to-finish instructions on how to run the app 4. Include screenshots, gifs or videos of the app functioning 5. Contain a link to a deployed version of the app 6. Clearly list the technologies used in the app 7. State your role in the app development
